import React from 'react' import { useState, ueEffect } from 'react' import { Widgets } from "@mui/icons-material" import '../style/Nav.css' import { useSpring, animated, config } from 'react-spring' function Nav() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const props_menu = useSpring({ to: { opacity: 1 }, from: { opacity: -1 }, delay: 1000 }) return isOpen ? (

setIsOpen(false) } > Fermer

Menu

  • Widget1
  • Widget2
  • Widget3
  • Widget4
  • Widget5
  • Widget6
) : (

setIsOpen(true) } > Ouvrir le menu

) } export default Nav;
